author: mahadev
msg: MAPREDUCE-2877. Add missing Apache license header in some files in MR and also add the rat plugin to the poms. (mahadev)

author: romanstumm
msg: BVAL-92 applied patch "apache-bval-20110327231539-jw.diff" from Jörg Waßmer to fix Security holes in org.apache.bval.util.PrivilegedActions. Removed all deprecated and unused methods by changing the source code that still used deprecated methods.
Needed to enter a version for findbugs-maven-plugin, because I couldn't build with maven without it.

author: slaws
msg: Extend test to call the callback and add (commented out) changes to demonstrate the danger of retrieving and endpoint for a component that hosts callback endpoints.
